org.gridkit.coherence.search
Interface IndexEngineConfig

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultIndexEngineConfig
public interface IndexEngineConfig

API to configure options of Coherence indexing engine.

Author:
Alexey Ragozin (alexey.ragozin@gmail.com)

Method Summary

Method Detail

getIndexUpdateQueueSizeLimit

int getIndexUpdateQueueSizeLimit()
Returns:
max queue size for asynchronous index updates. 0 - updates are synchronous.

setIndexUpdateQueueSizeLimit

void setIndexUpdateQueueSizeLimit(int queueSize)
Sets asynchronous update queue size limit. 0 - updates are synchronous.

Parameters:
queueSize -

getIndexUpdateDelay

int getIndexUpdateDelay()
Max delay in ms before update will be applied to index if asynchronous updates are enables.

setIndexUpdateDelay

void setIndexUpdateDelay(int indexUpdateDelay)
Sets Max delay in ms before update will be applied to index if asynchronous updates are enables.

Parameters:
indexUpdateDelay -

isAttributeIndexEnabled

boolean isAttributeIndexEnabled()
Search engine can maintain separate standard index based of same extractor. This index is available for common Coherence filters and can be used to retrieve original values on updates.

Returns:
true if attribute index enabled

setAttributeIndexEnabled

void setAttributeIndexEnabled(boolean enabled)
Set attributeIndex option. Seee isAttributeIndexEnabled()

isOldValueOnUpdateEnabled

boolean isOldValueOnUpdateEnabled()
Up on updates or deletes search engine may put some effort to retrieve value of attribute before update. If particular index does not need this, option can be turned off to save some processing.

Returns:
true original value will be retrieved

setOldValueOnUpdateEnabled

void setOldValueOnUpdateEnabled(boolean enabled)
Set oldValueOnUpdate option. See isOldValueOnUpdateEnabled()
